description:
Play soothing sound effects to help you relax and drown out background noise. Intended to be an android port of Blanket. Features:
  • Play any combination of 15 calming noises on loop mixed at volumes of your chosing
  • Import custom audio assets
  • Save your favorite combinations and load them later
  • Start default profile on launch (optional)
  • Set a sleep timer and have all noises fade out after a delay
Based on Blanket, available on flathub.
